metadata.title: DPM condoles death in tragic Air India flight crash in Ahmedabad

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister (DPM/FM), Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Thursday expressed his condolences over loss of precious lives in the tragic Air India flight crash that left scores dead in Ahmedabad, The deputy prime minister wrote on his official X wall: "Saddened at the crash of Air India flight in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. Condolences over the loss of precious lives in this tragic incident." He also extended his sympathies with the families of the victims in this hour of grief.
